title: AWS RoboMaker: Cloud-Based Robotics Development and Deployment
description: This document provides an overview of AWS RoboMaker, Amazon's cloud-based service for robotics developers. RoboMaker extends ROS and ROS 2 with cloud services, enabling large-scale simulation, intelligent robotics functions, and automated deployment.
